champ.champInfo:
The general management of the organization and conduct of competitions is carried out by the NGO "Volyn Oblast Kyokushinkai Karate Federation", Department of Youth Culture and Sports of the Volyn Regional State Administration, Department of Family, Youth and sports of the Lutsk City Council. The direct management rests with the president of the VoFKK V.V. Muscovite (4th dan, Lutsk) and the main panel of judges


Organizing committee and judges:

  • The chief judge of the competition is V.V. Moskvich (4th Dan, Lutsk)
  • Deputies of the chief judge of the competition Ovsiyuk RA (1st dan, Lutsk)
  • V.L. Fedoruk, deputy chief judge of the competition. (1st Dan, Kivertsi)
  • Deputies of the chief judge of the competition Tkachuk A (1st court, Lutsk)
  • Secretary of the competition Baran O.V. (1st Dan, Lutsk)
  • Technical support of Tatarchenko I.Yu. (Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Lutsk, 3 Shevchenko St., ODYUSSh

The competition will be held in Lutsk on February 9-10, 2024.

Competition program

February 9 (Friday):

  • 08:30 – 09:00: Pre-weighing ODYUSSh, str.Shevchenko 3
  • 09:00 – 12:30: Weighing of participants, mandate commission /allowed also on the day of the competition/
  • 12:30 – 14:00: meeting of judges and team representatives

February 10 (Saturday):

  • 08:30 – 09:00: weighing of participants, mandate committee, meeting of judges and team representatives
  • 09:00 - 09:30: ceremonial opening of the competition
  • 09:30 – 12:30: qualifying matches
  • 12:30 - 13:30: break
  • 13:30 - 17:00: final part of the competition
  • 17:30 - 18:30: awarding of winners

Competition rules.

  • Competitions are held separately for male and female participants
  • Qualification degree:- Series "A" (up to 9 kyu), Series "B" (8 kyu + )

Categories of participants:

Junior boys/girls, children (Series A/Series B):
Year of birth Duel time
2018 1.0 min -18 -21 -23 -26 -30 30+
2016-2017 1.0 min -20 -25 -30 -35 -40 40+
2014-2015 1.0 min -25 -30 -35 -40 -45 45+
2012-2013 1.0 min -30 -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 55+
2010-2011 1.0 min -35 -40 -45 -50 -55 -60 -65 65+

Categories without division by KYU:

2008-2009 Young men 1.5 min -50 -55 -60 -65 -70 -75 75+
2008-2009 Girls 1.5 min -45 -50 -55 -60 60+
2006-2007 Young men 2.0 min -60 -65 -70 -75 -80 80+
2006-2007 Girls 2.0 min -50 -55 -60 60+
Scheme of fights in the "Kumite" section among juniors (2006-2007): 2 min., 2 min., /weighing 3.5 kg/ 2 min.


Year of birth Gender
1990-2005 Men -60 -70 -80 -90 90+
Scheme of matches among men
Qualifying: 2 min., 2 min., /weighing 5 kg/ 2 min.
Semifinal/final: 3 min., 2 min., 2 min., /weighing 5 kg/ 2 min.


Financing

< p > The expenses for the organization of the competition are carried out at the expense of the NGO "Lutska Miska Kyokushinkai Karate Federation", NGO "Volyn Regional Kyokushinkai Karate Federation", interested institutions, organizations and sponsors. Travel expenses of participants, team representatives, coaches, judges (travel in both directions, location, food, per diem on the road, saving wages, etc.) - for the account of the funds of the sending organizations.

Awards

  • Athletes who took 1-3 places are awarded with cups, medals, diplomas of the respective degrees
  • At the end of the competition, athletes will be awarded with cups and diplomas in various categories

Registration

Registration for participation in the competition takes place through a personal account until January 27, 2024. Or to the e-mail of the organizing committee:

viktor.kyokushin@gmail.com
Viktor Volodymyrovych Moskvich, tel. +38(067)-672-09-07

Tatarchenkoiu@ukr.net
Ihor Yuriyovych Tatarchenko tel. +38(067)-788-77-28

Application letter for participation according to the form established by the NFKKU, approved by the medical and physical culture dispensary and the head of sports. Organizations are submitted to the mandate commission before the start of the competition. Teams that have confirmed their participation within the set deadline are admitted to the competition
